metadata.title: CVE-2023-6872 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Browser tab titles were being leaked by GNOME to system logs. This couldpotentially expose the browsing habits of users running in a private tab.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 121.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
